title: Marcellin9
author: Marcellin9
content: Cristinao Ronaldo has been All the news recently: his problems with Coach and some teammates, the latest interview on the upcoming FIFA world cup and the most talked about topic CR7 NFTs soon coming on Binance today in a few hours...Given his huge fame and popularity in real world, the Cristiano Ronaldo NFTs are receiving more attentions in the crypto space, even Binance's CZ is supporting him. Will the CR7 NFTs beome a huge hit ?

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: AFAIK the Nft market flopped and it'll also affect the ongoing CR7 project though his fans will blow the Nft up but sooner, I predict, the NFT will drop too like bored Ape when the hype is gone.

comments.author: Marcellin9
comments.body: Quote from: Accardo on November 18, 2022, 06:30:59 AMAFAIK the Nft market flopped and it'll also affect the ongoing CR7 project though his fans will blow the Nft up but sooner, I predict, the NFT will drop too like bored Ape when the hype is gone. Probably. Seems the prices are going insane now. I guess Cristiano is too busy with the World Cup and don't wanna spare any time on NFT at the moment. After a few big matches, he'll come and see his NFT prices going skyrocketing. That'll be awesome.

comments.author: kelonmusk
comments.body: No one can deny the fact that Cristiano Ronaldo is already a superstar in the world of football and almost everyone who watches football knows about it. But in the crypto world it is not easy to predict because it depends on many factors.The issue is whether Ronaldo fans will start buying, trading and selling NFT CR7 tokens once his ICO starts.I think, if NFTs depend solely on one's fame or hype, it won't last long.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.created_time: November 19, 2022, 07:53:43 AMLast edit: November 19, 2022, 08:15:00 AM by Majestic-milf
comments.body: Partnering with Ronaldo will further boost Binance popularity in the sports world for sure, although they've plied their trade with Lazio and Brasileirao, it would still serve as positive publicity. Ronaldo is already popular, but I feel this is not just business to him, but a means to help him reach out to his fans. Surprisingly, it could gain clout and recognition so much that even with the start of his ICO, they'd still want to trade. Take Dogecoin for instance.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: I remember what happened to some celebrities that promoted FTX Exchange before, I think there are some rumors spreading that those celebrities are being sued like Tom Brady who promoted FTX Exchange before.Now, I am surprised a big celebrity also promoted and now got NFT on the top cryptocurrency exchange. I hope issue with FTX Exchange will not affect these celebrity promotions on cryptocurrency relate.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Marcellin9 on November 18, 2022, 06:05:44 AMCristinao Ronaldo has been All the news recently: his problems with Coach and some teammates, the latest interview on the upcoming FIFA world cup and the most talked about topic CR7 NFTs soon coming on Binance today in a few hours...Given his huge fame and popularity in real world, the Cristiano Ronaldo NFTs are receiving more attentions in the crypto space, even Binance's CZ is supporting him. Binance/CZ won't be taking him as back up for an NFT if he's not that influential at all. Binance knows how huge the market they can take with CRs fandom and community.Quote from: Marcellin9 on November 18, 2022, 06:05:44 AMWill the CR7 NFTs beome a huge hit ? We'll have to wait until they post some announcements that it's a big hit and success. But I think that since he's got the deal with Binance and he's very popular, it has a big chance that it will become successful even if the we're in a bear market.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: The ones who will benefit from that launch are the ones who are holding it already. They could sell the most limited edition at a high price, and in the future, it will go down in history as a project to have been bought and gone away. I do hope that it continues, but most of those types of projects should have some benefit to them and become inexpensive, and be developed continuously. Maybe being in an official club could make it a thing that could help them be successful in that project. Is there a good resource to read about this?

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Quote from: Marcellin9 on November 18, 2022, 06:05:44 AMCristinao Ronaldo has been All the news recently: his problems with Coach and some teammates, the latest interview on the upcoming FIFA world cup and the most talked about topic CR7 NFTs soon coming on Binance today in a few hours...Given his huge fame and popularity in real world, the Cristiano Ronaldo NFTs are receiving more attentions in the crypto space, even Binance's CZ is supporting him. Will the CR7 NFTs beome a huge hit ? I think the question is, if NFT will still be hype in the next coming bull run.Because if it is, then for sure, all NFTs ,regardless if it is from CR7 or some some other sport personalities will have a huge jump in price as well, lets say in 2024-2025. But if the whole hype is replaced by a new thing in crypto space, then definitely their NFTs might die as well.So hard to say what the future will bring, we will have to wait and see.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: Marcellin9 on November 18, 2022, 06:05:44 AMGiven his huge fame and popularity in real world, the Cristiano Ronaldo NFTs are receiving more attentions in the crypto space, even Binance's CZ is supporting him. Will the CR7 NFTs become a huge hit ? It may turn out to be a success maybe, but I don't think it will be a success suddenly like this year or the early quarters of next year. This year 2022 has been not so good for both NFT's and cryptocurrency and since we are already close to the end of the year, it is possible that this bad run spills into some weeks of the new year. It is possible that the binance team has a strategy to make this project a success quickly before it fades out, It has to be a really good strategy because NFT's already look to be loosing the hype.

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: As for the partnership, I think it's a win win for both parties, even if CR7 is not really playing good as of late, he is still considered as one of the greatest football player of our generation so he can still attract his fans, whether crypto enthusiast or not, to maybe jump on the bandwagon in NFT for him.At the same time, Binance and CZ will have their exposure again in the biggest sporting event that we have right now which is the World cup.So for now, both are going to enjoy the fruits of their partnership.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Marcellin9 on November 18, 2022, 06:05:44 AM...NFTs beome a huge hit ? Cristiano Ronaldo has a huge number of fans all over the world. It is for fans that such an NFT of their idol will have real value and owning it will allow them to fix this status. It is the fans who will become the main buyers of this NFT, although most purchases will be made on the secondary market, and not directly through the Binance.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: It will become successful, but in SHORT TIME!Anyone who bought the NFT especially on pre sale and then sell it when you've get it with the cheap price, you will make huge profit when you sell it to public. But I didn't advice anyone to bought this NFT since the developer could be scam you or you're not get this NFT at the cheapest price when it's early launched. As sooner or later this NFT will become useless since they'll realized if NFT has no any benefit.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: I doubt that it would. Even if Ronaldo has the popularity, it won't be enough. We've seen projects before promoted by celebrities and athletes but those projects still did not work as planned simply because not all investors especially in this industry can be easily carried away by popularity of the project. Many investors are putting much work on doing research for projects of interest to gauge if it would be worthy of investing their money with. Most of the time, projects under celebrities' name falls down upon being released in the market especially if its utility is not sustainable.  Unless the team of this project  will make changes with its concept concerning improvements.

comments.author: inanilujimi
comments.body: There is no doubt that in a short time there may be a jump in the value of the nft when it is listed on binance, but long term success I doubt it, we have seen a lot of nft popularized by famous athletes but it only attracts momentary hype.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: It seems like the hype gonna happen in a short time. I just learned from what happened with so many NFTs on opensea that have been released by so many big names. Those NFTs are nothing right now. The same scenario will happen with CR7 NFTs. I didn't even something big like a any CR9 NFTs will have very big price floor. NFTs are still dead and it's not yet active like last year. The hype of NFTs has gone. CR7 is too late to launch its NFTs. It might be last year when NFTs was still booming but not this time when everything are still in red.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: Marcellin9 on November 18, 2022, 06:05:44 AMCristinao Ronaldo has been All the news recently: his problems with Coach and some teammates, the latest interview on the upcoming FIFA world cup and the most talked about topic CR7 NFTs soon coming on Binance today in a few hours...Given his huge fame and popularity in real world, the Cristiano Ronaldo NFTs are receiving more attentions in the crypto space, even Binance's CZ is supporting him. Will the CR7 NFTs beome a huge hit ? I am sure that CR7 NFTs will achieve great success thanks to the media and sports fans, and the hype will play an important role in that, as the NFTS of football legend Cristiano has had a huge global marketing campaign since the first hours of its launch on Binance, and Binance has exploited this partnership in its favor as where the new users, who are the first 1.5 million users, will get the Cristiano Mystery Box after they register with the RONALDO referral code, you can imagine the masses of football fans who will join Binance and the virtual world in order to participate in Cristiano's NFTs auction through this partnership.

comments.author: zonefloor
comments.body: As a result, the World Cup is about to begin and it will receive serious attention from its fans. However, when we look at it in the long term, I think that the NFT period is over and I don't think it will make a lot of money for its investors in the long run. It can be evaluated if it can be bought at cheap prices at the moment. But I think it will be trash after a long time.

comments.author: merekamo
comments.body: In terms of the collaboration between Binance and CR7, it can be said that this is a good step for both of them. Binance can attract investors from the world of sports. Likewise from the CR7, it benefits from both sides.Indeed, Cristiano Ronaldo (CR7) has millions of fans around the world. However, not all of them will buy or hold (hold) the CR7 NFT. However, now the trend of NFT is declining. I think the CR7 NFT may not be used as a long-term asset.

comments.author: Marcellin9
comments.body: Quote from: shinratensei_ on November 19, 2022, 04:19:14 PMIt seems like the hype gonna happen in a short time. I just learned from what happened with so many NFTs on opensea that have been released by so many big names. Those NFTs are nothing right now. The same scenario will happen with CR7 NFTs. I didn't even something big like a any CR9 NFTs will have very big price floor. NFTs are still dead and it's not yet active like last year. The hype of NFTs has gone. CR7 is too late to launch its NFTs. It might be last year when NFTs was still booming but not this time when everything are still in red. True. NFTs are not trendy any more. Wiht the huge popularity of CR, CR7 might draw much sudden attention from his fans and many investors in a short span of period. However, in the long run, CR7 is going to lose edge and everything will fade away soon. Personally I am not football fan but I admire CR's whole spirit as a sportsman. Wish him the good luck.
